anathema: Destroy forbidden lore, reveal the entirety of a secret
edict: Learn and hoard forbidden magic, steal secrets from others
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Abraxas (Master of the Final Incantation)](/Deities.aspx?ID=425)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 302

Abraxas, the Master of the Final Incantation, is the demon lord of forbidden lore, magic, and snakes. Abraxas has an encyclopedic knowledge of magical formulas and destructive secrets, favoring those that inflict suffering and destruction. His Final Incantation is a word of power that can unravel the mightiest of spells and unmake even artifacts. He takes the form of a viperlegged [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=628) with a fanged, deformed bird’s head.

Abraxas’s cults are most prevalent in [the Darklands](/Rules.aspx?ID=2993) of Golarion, but small circles devoted to him can be found in most major cities on the surface as well.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Demon Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=5)

**Edicts** Learn and hoard forbidden magic, steal secrets from others

**Anathema** Destroy forbidden lore, reveal the entirety of a secret

**Area of Concern**
Forbidden lore, magic, snakes

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35)

**Favored Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=404)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=71), [Dragon](/Domains.aspx?ID=106), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=82)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=109)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Share Lore](/Spells.aspx?ID=2363)

- **2nd**
[Ghostly Carrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=1543)

- **3rd**
[Hypercognition](/Spells.aspx?ID=1563)

- **4th**
[Reflective Scales](/Spells.aspx?ID=2362)

- **5th**
[Slither](/Spells.aspx?ID=1676)

- **6th**
[Never Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=1614)

- **7th**
[Contingency](/Spells.aspx?ID=1472)

- **8th**
[Unrelenting Observation](/Spells.aspx?ID=1734)

- **9th**
[Detonate Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=1488)

</column>
